item.description:
The Banfi presentation is Mon, Jan 25 , 7pm at Embassy Suites, Marlboro,MA

Sharron McCarthy will speak about Banfi history and wines. Cost is $10/person which includes Banfi History, 7 Banfi wines with cheese/crackers from Rick at The VinBin.

Only an RSVP of YES is needed. Please RSVP by Tuesday, Jan 5.
Since seating is limited, please send your $10 to me at your earliest convenience.
I accept Paypal at mb_816@Yahoo.com or send to: 3 Saratoga Dr, Hudson, MA 01749



This was posted by Rick from VinBin:
Sharron McCarthy is one of this country's most authoritative figures in the world of wine.

On Jan. 25, the Vin Bin and the American Wine Society will present Sharron and Banfi Wines in a two-hour long discussion, tasting and eno exploration at the Embassy Suites Hotel.

Not only does Sharron represent Banfi Wines, she has been called upon numerous times by the media for her opinion on the wine trade. She is currently the president of the Society of Wine Educators (SWE).

On the 25th, she will feature an assortment of Banfi wines and styles.

The wines featured include:

* 2008 Centine Rose
* 2008 Cecchi Bonizio
* 2004 Val delle Rose Morellino di Scansano Riserva
* 2005 Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva
* 2007 Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
* 2005 BelNerO
* 2003 Poggio alle Mura
